title: MySQL database connection needs a table
author: KeinSupporter
body_snippet:
As soon as I want to create a new database connection via MySQL, this error message appears after the connection test (see screenshot)

Version: v1.77.3.1442-NB

![Screenshot 2023-04-25 113307](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/131761636/234238547-3db14379-77a2-4dc7-9145-619275c7d387.png)


```
Fehlermeldung
"Table 'mRemoteNG.tblRoot' doesn't exist"

Stack trace
   at MySql.Data.MySqlClient.MySqlStream.ReadPacket()
   at MySql.Data.MySqlClient.NativeDriver.GetResult(Int32& a...

comments.snippet:
See here
https://github.com/mRemoteNG/mRemoteNG/issues/2425

They removed the SQL script from the documentation that sets up your DB. But no one seems to care about it...

comments.snippet: we have fix in newest code, it will create required tables
```
